title: Nation Red MULTI9 PCDVD iNLAWS
description:
About This Game

Nation Red is an ultrafast infinite play arena-based shooter designed for a close-quarter battlefield experience in a frantic, bloody fight against thousands of zombie mutants and their bosses. Battle through 18 quests and fight in several gameplay modes, survival, freeplay, and a special unlockable mode, Blood Drive, for unlimited replayability. To help you, you will have access to a huge array of weapons, bombs, grenades, poison and dozens of modifications and power ups to pick up throughout your quest. 

Release Date: August 23, 2009 


Genre: Shooter
Publishers: Kaos Studios, Diezel Power Studios
Developer: Diezel Power Studios

Features:

*Ultra Fast Action Ã¢â‚¬â€ Fight armies of hundreds of zombies and their bosses in an exceptional close-quarter battlefield experience.
*Deadly Weapons Ã¢â‚¬â€ Use machetes, axes, jack hammers, dual Uzis, flame throwers, grenades, poison and a dozen more arms including a Steam Hammer, exclusive to Steam purchasers.
*Customize Yourself Ã¢â‚¬â€ Over thirty player modifiers combine with two dozen power-ups for limitless gameplay.
*Three Game Modes Ã¢â‚¬â€ Free Play, Survival and 18 increasingly brutal missions await.
*Zombies with Guns Ã¢â‚¬â€ They wield axes, cut-off saws, AK-47s and more.


Minimum Requirements
OS: Windows XP, Vista
Processor: Intel/AMD 2.0 Ghz or better
Memory: 256 MB+
Graphics: NVidia or ATI with shader 2.0 support (GeForce 6100, Radeon 9600 or newer)
DirectX: 9.0c
Hard Drive: 600MB
Sound: Any Windows compatible

Installation:

01. mount and install the game
02. Copy cracked content from /iNLAWS to the game folder
03. Launch the game and enjoy!
